conversation1.name: Jim
conversation1.dialogue: Pātai. He aha te momo pea te pai?

conversation1.name: Dwight
conversation1.dialogue: He tautohetohe tera. E rua nga kura whakaaro

conversation1.name: Jim
conversation1.dialogue: He pono: ka kai nga pea i nga beets

conversation1.name: Dwight
conversation1.dialogue: Kaore nga pea e mahi- he aha kei te haere? Kei te aha koe?

conversation1.name: Jim
conversation1.dialogue: I tera wiki i roto ahau i te toa rongoa ka kite ahau i enei mohiti. Mo te wha taara. A e whitu taara noa te utu ki a au ki te hanga ano i te toenga o te roopu, a ko te nui o te tekau ma tahi taara.
